name: QuickieDungeon
description:
Just a quick game made in a week for code testing for a bigger project. Story of the game is just how deep can you go in the forsaken dungeon before dying. Compete against other players for the top 10 in the world. Each play through is completely randomized so no two runs are the same.

No real options for sound/music/controls.

Controls for the game:

ControlAction
Attack/Open Chest/Altar
Defend
Go down a level

Use Potion

Future Plans:

If people enjoy and want it expanded/bug reports, I have no problem spending time doing some updates and making it a full fledged game. Just let me know.
